body_html:
Since the gradients are registered in the code, shouldn't it be possible to build the list programatically?

Parse each "ops" file in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/python/ops, and match the names with the corresponding "grad".
body_text:

body:
Since the gradients are registered in the code, shouldn't it be possible to build the list programatically?

Parse each "ops" file in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/python/ops, and match the names with the corresponding "grad".
